title: Stir Fried Bok Choy and Minced Pork
directions: In a wok add oil then cook pork mince until brown.
Add garlic and spring onions then stir fry until fragrant.
Add bok choy and Chinese cooking wine then stir fry until itâ€™s all coated with the oil, cover wok then let it cook for 2 minutes.
Add soy sauce and sesame oil then stir fry for 30 more seconds.
ingredients: 2 packs bok choy (roughly 500 g), sliced in the middle
